snippet: A teenager pleaded guilty on Monday and agreed to testify against others in a mob beating of a driver in Detroit who accidentally struck a child with his pickup.
abstract: Detroit teenager Bruce Wimbush pleads guilty in racially charged beating of driver Steve Utash, and agrees to testify against others who took part in the attack; faces up to 10 years in prison for assault.
lead_paragraph: A teenager pleaded guilty on Monday and agreed to testify against others in a mob beating of a driver in Detroit who accidentally struck a child with his pickup.

headline.main: Michigan: Teenager Pleads Guilty in Mob Attack on Driver
headline.print_headline: Michigan: Teenager Pleads Guilty in Mob Attack on Driver
